articles.summary: Zacks: Sterling Infrastructure and Taylor Morrison Home have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day. Sterling Infrastructure earns Bull of the Day as AI data center demand, reshoring and infrastructure spending fuel explosive earnings growth. Related tickers mentioned: LCID, STRL, TMHC, TSLA.

articles.title: Wall Street Gets Charged Up on Rivian Despite Short-Circuiting EV Market
articles.mainIdea: Wall Street Gets Charged Up on Rivian Despite Short-Circuiting EV Market
articles.summary: The Daily Upside: Wall Street Gets Charged Up on Rivian Despite Short-Circuiting EV Market. The increased price targets came just a week after Rivian announced it had developed its own artificial intelligence chip. Related tickers mentioned: NVDA, RIVN, TSLA.
